name: part_004
file: tmp_《Peafowl of The Blue Flame》 Pavolia Reine 3D Birthday Live 2025 #ReineMEPtember2025 [zKuxe-5Jxyc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Fire Dance' by Pavolia Reine featuring Takanashi Kiara, Tsunomaki Watame, and Anya Melfissa.
A transition scene featuring blue fire and smoke visuals with electronic music.
Duet performance of 'Bunny Girl - helakim Remix' by Pavolia Reine and Vestia Zeta.

subtitles.original: まだまだメラメラさせな！
subtitles.english: Keep it burning on and on!

subtitles.original: ガンガン昇る今ならごめん　邪魔させぬ頂上へ
subtitles.english:
Sorry, I'm rising up fast now
Won't let anyone block my way to the top

subtitles.original: 何があったって盛れ盛れ　ドンドン進め満てる航海目
subtitles.english:
No matter what happens, keep flourishing
Keep moving forward, eyes on the full voyage

subtitles.original: 手にしたタガが本番　手広げて手のひら返しは論外
subtitles.english:
The limits I've seized are just the start
Expanding my reach, turning back is out of the question

subtitles.original: 重ねる努力　力強きKO!
subtitles.english: Piling up efforts, with a powerful KO!

subtitles.original: ヤッパパナバナ　ぶちかますバンだ！
subtitles.english: Yappapanabana, it's time to let it rip!

subtitles.original: さあ歌え踊れ騒げスカビビ天国さ　ハハッ！
subtitles.english:
Now sing, dance, and make some noise
This is the Sukabibi paradise, haha!

subtitles.original: ヤッパパナバナ　ぶっ飛ばす場外！
subtitles.english: Yappapanabana, blast it out of the park!

subtitles.original: 頭で決めて限界なんて　当然一蹴　ちょっと待って
subtitles.english:
Deciding limits in your head
Is naturally kicked aside, wait a second

subtitles.original: 黄色のその感じ
subtitles.english: That yellow feeling

subtitles.original: いい顔のアンジュ
subtitles.english: With a great-looking face

subtitles.original: 好景気に強奪
subtitles.english: Snatching it up in a boom

subtitles.original: 音の鳴る方へ
subtitles.english: Towards where the sound is

subtitles.original: ヤッパパナバナ　ぶちかますバンだ！
subtitles.english: Yappapanabana, it's time to let it rip!

subtitles.english: Wait, wait, wait, keep it going!

subtitles.original: 夜の始まりさ　バニーガール誘惑される
subtitles.english:
It's the start of the night
Being tempted by the bunny girl

subtitles.original: 言動に弾け飛ぶ　葛藤に愛を乾杯
subtitles.english:
Bursting with every word and action
A toast to love amidst the conflict

subtitles.original: 伝えられなくても
subtitles.english: Even if it can't be conveyed

subtitles.original: 恋の始まりさ　バニーガールだらしねえ顔
subtitles.english:
It's the start of a romance
Bunny girl with a messy, relaxed face

subtitles.original: 穿って澄んだ　君の目を離さない
subtitles.english: I won't let go of your piercing, clear eyes

subtitles.original: さあ刻めステップ刻んで
subtitles.english: Come on, carve out the steps, carve them in

subtitles.original: 仕事帰りの疲れは
subtitles.english: The fatigue after coming home from work

subtitles.original: 私とこのグラスに
subtitles.english: Leave it with me and this glass

subtitles.original: そう自分好みに着替えて
subtitles.english: That's right, change into something you like

subtitles.original: 世間に対する気持ち
subtitles.english: Your feelings toward the world

subtitles.original: 私に注いでみない？ Oh
subtitles.english: Why don't you pour them out to me? Oh

subtitles.original: ありきたりなラブソングでも　愛が込められてるの
subtitles.english:
Even a generic love song
Can be filled with love

subtitles.original: それでも汚れるのなんて　君を見ればわかるの
subtitles.english:
But that it'll still get tarnished
I can tell just by looking at you

subtitles.original: 下を向く君の目を
subtitles.english: Those eyes of yours looking down

subtitles.original: 無理矢理剥ごうとはしない
subtitles.english: I won't try to force them open

subtitles.original: だからそんな顔せず手を差し伸べてほら
subtitles.english: So don't make that face, look, reach out your hand

subtitles.english: Thinking I've known your love, getting high on it

subtitles.original: 感動去っていて　毎晩泣いていてさ
subtitles.english: The emotion has faded, and I'm crying every night

subtitles.original: それくらいがいいんでしょ
subtitles.english: That's just about right, isn't it?
